name: Fionazy.GitHub.io
body:
**Welcome**

This is a collection of some of my technical work related to quantitative finance. Homework sets, papers I've authored, Python programs, and blog posts are all fair game.

**Programming in Finance**

We use Python, R and MATLAB in some of our classes, and I have some experience in C and SAS.

**About me**

My name is Yan (Fiona) Zhuang. I am a graduate student inÂ Quantitative Finance and Risk Management program in University of Michigan, Ann Arbor. And I will receive a Master of Science degree in December 2016. I did my undergraduate work in University of International Business and Economics, majoring in Financial Engineering.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
